content:
American Airlines, yeah...

Don't worry about the meh experience; let's focus on finding you a fantastic business class deal to London!

You were saying you're tracking prices, and I'm excited to help you with that. Have you considered setting up price alerts for specific airlines, like British Airways, American Airlines, or Virgin Atlantic? You can also look into error fares, sales, or special promotions that might pop up.

Additionally, you might want to explore different routes, like flying into London Heathrow (LHR) or London Gatwick (LGW), as prices can vary depending on the airport.

Remember to stay flexible with your travel dates, as prices can fluctuate greatly depending on the day of the week and time of year. If you have any specific travel dates in mind, I can try to help you find the best deals for those dates.

Let me know if there's anything else I can do to assist you in your quest for a fantastic business class ticket to London!
